text: Ucayali is a region in Peru. The capital is the city of Pucallpa. It is in the Amazon rainforest and is bordered by the Brazilian state of Acre on the east; the department of Madre de Dios on the southeast; Cusco on the south; Junín, Pasco and Huánuco on the west; and Loreto on the north. The name Ucayali comes from the Ucayali River. == Other websites == * Category:Regions of Peru
title: Ucayali Region
